Description:
Salla, a leading Information Technology and Services company, is seeking a talented Senior Product Designer to join their team. As a Senior Product Designer, you will be responsible for leading the design of innovative products across different platforms. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to create design solutions that meet business goals and exceed user expectations. The ideal candidate has a strong portfolio demonstrating their experience in conceptualizing, designing, and delivering successful products.Design digital experiences for web, iOS, Android, and operator platforms
Lead the design of new product features with an emphasis on user-centered design principlesCollaborate with cross-functional teams to translate business goals and requirements into effective design solutions
Conduct user research to inform design decisions and test design solutions to ensure user satisfaction
Develop detailed design specifications and design documentation to support product development
Drive design thinking and design culture throughout the organization, including mentoring junior designers on the team
Ensure design consistency across all products and platforms by developing and maintaining design systems
Stay up-to-date with industry trends, design technologies, and emerging design patterns
Present design work and regularly engage with partners for feedbackJob Details
